AssignVariable.Name: pds.error.diagnostics
AssignVariable.Template: Your application, {developer.app.name}, has exceeded its quota of {app_quota_limit} requests every {app_quota_interval} {app_quota_timeunit}(s) and is being rate limited. Please see: https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/guides-and-documentation/reference-guide#rate-limits for more details.
